title: Labor market growth slows dramatically in August with U.S. adding just 54,000 jobs, ADP says
description: U.S. private sector hiring rose less than expected in August, per the ADP.
body: U.S. private sector hiring rose less than expected in August, per the ADP.

title: Pulte refuses to say where he got Lisa Cook mortgage fraud ‘tip’
description: President Donald Trump's housing finance chief Bill Pulte has accused Cook of claiming multiple properties as her primary residence.
body: President Donald Trump's housing finance chief Bill Pulte has accused Cook of claiming multiple properties as her primary residence.

title: Salesforce slump deepens as stock drops 7% on disappointing guidance
description: Salesforce's revenue forecast for the current quarter came in below expectations.
body: Salesforce's revenue forecast for the current quarter came in below expectations.

title: Watch: Senate Banking Committee holds confirmation hearing for Trump Fed nominee Miran
description: Stephen Miran, President Donald Trump's nominee for the open Fed governor post vacated by Adriana Kugler, will come under scrutiny from lawmakers.
body: Stephen Miran, President Donald Trump's nominee for the open Fed governor post vacated by Adriana Kugler, will come under scrutiny from lawmakers.

title: Orsted sues to save offshore wind farm from Trump administration axe
description: Orsted asked the United States District Court for the District of Columbia to set aside the stop-work order, calling it "unlawful" and "issued in bad faith."
body: Orsted asked the United States District Court for the District of Columbia to set aside the stop-work order, calling it "unlawful" and "issued in bad faith."

title: Figma's stock slumps 18% after first earnings report to lowest since IPO
description: Figma shares plummeted after the design software vendor reported earnings for the first time as a public company.
body: Figma shares plummeted after the design software vendor reported earnings for the first time as a public company.

title: T. Rowe Price shares rocket higher after deal where Goldman will invest $1 billion in asset manager
description: Goldman will buy up to $1 billion in T. Rowe Price common stock through open-market purchases with the intention to own up to 3.5%.
body: Goldman will buy up to $1 billion in T. Rowe Price common stock through open-market purchases with the intention to own up to 3.5%.
